short_description: This is a simple website that shows answers to course assignments regarding computer environment management.
long_description: This is a site that displays answers to course questions regarding subjects such as: what is git and how do you use it?, variuos bash/python-scripts related content.

short_description: This is a game that centers around creating your own platforming challenges.
long_description: Create your own platforming challenges and invite your friends to try them out. Choose between numerous of obstacles and enemies.

short_description: Want to know more about cryptocurrency, invest or just want to discuss the subject with someone, then you have come to the right place.
long_description: The complete social network for people intrested in cryptocurrency, beginner or professional, everyone is welcome at the crypt.
